label: TraceabilityEvent
comment: The TraceabilityEvent class represents a specific EPCIS event in the traceability chain of a product, including details about the event type and reference.

datatypeProperties.comment: A URI pointing to the detailed information about the EPCIS event. Most likely in the form of a verifiable credential.
A code representing the type of EPCIS event. ObjectEvent, AggregationEvent, TransactionEvent, TransformationEvent, ObjectEvent.

referencedBy.comment: An array of TraceabilityEvent objects detailing EPCIS events related to the traceability of the product batch.
